name: Alice Bennett
description: Alice works at 'Costa' from 08:30 to 17:00. She enjoys her daily routine and often grabs a coffee before starting her shift.

name: James Carter
description: James is a barista at 'The George and Dragon'. His work hours are from 07:00 to 15:00, and he enjoys chatting with regulars.

name: Sophie Davis
description: Sophie works at 'Deli Di Luca' from 10:00 to 18:00. She loves preparing fresh sandwiches and meeting new customers.

name: Daniel Evans
description: Daniel is a cashier at 'Co-op Food', working from 09:00 to 17:00. He enjoys helping customers find what they need.

name: Olivia Foster
description: Olivia is a pharmacist at 'Day Lewis Pharmacy', working from 08:00 to 16:30. She ensures everyone gets the right medication.

name: William Green
description: William is a teacher at 'Churchill Church of England Voluntary Controlled Primary School', working from 07:30 to 15:30.

name: Emily Harris
description: Emily works at 'Squerryes Winery' from 11:00 to 19:00. She enjoys giving wine tours and tastings to visitors.
